name: search-index
description: A network resilient, persistent full-text search library for the browser and Node.js

scripts.test: npm run empty-sandbox && npm run test-node && npm run test-browser && npm run lint
scripts.test-browser: npm run empty-sandbox && webpack test/src/*-test.js -o test/sandbox/bundle.js && cat test/sandbox/bundle.js | tape-run
scripts.test-node: rollup -c && npm run empty-sandbox && tape test/cjs/*.js
